Package suga.engine.game

Interface Game

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicGame
public interface Game
Games require a main game loop to run along with game components that need to be run every game cycle.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAgent(AIAgent agent)
    Registers a new AI agent so that it can be called every tick after collisions but before object logic.

    Registers a new DrawingListener.

  • Method Details

    • setThread

      void setThread(SugaThread thread)
      Sets the thread that is calling loop() on this Game.
      Parameters:
      thread - The thread that will be calling loop() on this object.

    • setPanel

      void setPanel(GraphicsPanel panel)
      Sets the graphics panel being used by this game.
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel to assign to this game.

    • setKeyListener

      void setKeyListener(GameKeyListener listener)
      Sets the key listener currently being used by this game.
      Parameters:
      listener - The new key listener that this game should use.

    • setMouseListener

      void setMouseListener(GameMouseListener listener)
      Sets the mouse listener currently being used by this game.
      Parameters:
      listener - The new mouse listener that this game should use.

    • getThread

      SugaThread getThread()
      Accessor method for the thread that is calling loop(). This can be used to determine whether the game has stopped or paused.
      Returns:
      The thread that is running this game instance.

    • loop

      void loop()
      The main logic loop for the game. Will be called depending on the rate of the logic thread.

    • processInput

      void processInput()
      Processes inputs given by players. Is run during pause.

    • addGameObject

      void addGameObject(String name, GameObject object)
      Adds a GameObject by the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the game object. Can be used later to remove the item.
      object - The game object to add.

    • getGameObject

      GameObject getGameObject(String name)
      Accessor method for game objects.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the object to attempt to get.
      Returns:
      The found object or null.

    • addAgent

      void addAgent(AIAgent agent)
      Registers a new AI agent so that it can be called every tick after collisions but before object logic.
      Parameters:
      agent - The AIAgent to add into the list of agents.

    • addDrawingListener

      void addDrawingListener(DrawListener listener)
      Registers a new DrawingListener. This will not register anything beyond the draw method. Usually used by UI, hence the name.
      Parameters:
      listener - The draw listener that should be registered to this panel.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears all AIAgents, physics managers, GameObjects, and PanelListeners.

    • loadScene

      boolean loadScene(String name)
      Attempts to load the given scene. If successful with return true, if un-found or loading fails, will return false.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the scene to attempt loading.
      Returns:
      True on a successful scene load.

    • getPanel

      GraphicsPanel getPanel()
      Accessor method for the graphics panel used by the server.
      Returns:
      The panel used by the server.

    • getMouseListener

      GameMouseListener getMouseListener()
      Accessor method for the mouse listener used by the server.
      Returns:
      The mouse listener used by the server.
